price: Ubwo twahishuriraga nyoko ibyo twamuhishuriye (tugira) tuti
arabic: إِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh awḥaynā ilā ummika mā yūḥā
